data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 1,978,404 believers in Golog Tibetan to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Golog Tibetan, Qinghai, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the county of Golog Tibetan. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.section_summary: On average, 33 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Golog Tibetan, Qinghai, China.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, move the 1,978,404 believers in the county of Golog Tibetan to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Golog Tibetan, Qinghai, China.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Amdo, Rongba people.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Golog Tibetan. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Golog Tibetan, Qinghai, China to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary:
the county of Golog Tibetan, Qinghai, China has a population of 26,079,300.

We estimate Golog Tibetan has 1,978,404 people who might know Jesus, 421,308 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 23,679,587 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Golog Tibetan, Qinghai, China who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.
